events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday where another vehicle collided with mine from the rear.
The claim has been identified as an auto accident involving a rear-end collision on a busy intersection.
An insurance agent was assigned to my case to handle the investigation and further processing.
I received confirmation that my auto accident claim has been acknowledged by the insurance company.
The insurance company requested the police report, photographs of the damage, and my vehicle registration.
I submitted all requested documents including the police report and photos showing the extensive damage.
The insurance firm began its investigation into the accident circumstances to determine fault and damage extent.
The investigation into the vehicle collision was concluded with findings supporting my reported damages.
A settlement offer was proposed based on the repair estimates and liability assessment from the accident.
I provided feedback expressing appreciation for the timely responses and transparent communication.
The claim was approved officially allowing me to proceed with the repairs as per the settlement agreement.
Payment for the accident repairs was issued promptly to the repair shop as per agreed settlement terms.
The insurance claim for the car accident has been officially closed after full settlement and payment.
All related documents and records for this auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
